com.storytron.swat

Class BackgroundInformationPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.storytron.swat.BackgroundInformationPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public abstract class BackgroundInformationPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A class for editing and displaying background information about things. It displays an image, a text description and a list of traits.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
